name: HSP_ACCT_FINDX_ALT
description: This table contains the hospital account alternate final diagnoses from the hospital account (HAR) master file. Alternate final diagnoses will be specified if hospital accounts are coded with two sets of ICD codes.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the hospital account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_ID
columns.description: The alternate final diagnoses stored in the hospital account.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_EXCLD_YN
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis exclude from clinical reporting data.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_POA_C_NAME
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis present on admission data.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_CC_C_NAME
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis complication / comorbidity data.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_HAC_YN
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis hospital acquired condition data.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_AFDRG_YN
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis affects DRG data.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_SOI_C_NAME
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis severity of illness data.
entries: Principal Dx Used for SOI/ROM Calc

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_ROM_C_NAME
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis risk of mortality data.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_AFSOI_YN
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis affects severity of illness data.

columns.name: FIN_DX_ALT_AFROM_YN
columns.description: The alternate final diagnosis affects risk of mortality data.
